Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The people are buzzing with talks on the upcoming Federal budget in the tweetosphere. There is sharp criticism of the government's stance on the JobSeeker rate while the Labor party has been accused of a lack of action. Calls are being made for increased support for young people and healthcare affordability. LNP is requesting full funding for Rockhampton's Ring Road and GPs are urging changes in health cover affordability. Amidst this a committee has urged for a substantial increase in the JobSeeker rate which people prioritize over tax cuts.
